name: Brown Sugar Smokies
comments: This is a fabulous appetizer that will be eaten up quickly at any function
instructions: Dredge bacon and smokies in sugar, then roll up smokies in bacon. Place on plate covered with paper towels and microwave on High 2 minutes. Place in 9x13"pan and bake at 350 degrees for 10 minutes. Top with more brown sugar and broil on High for 5 minutes.
